args: Akasha... The name of the void.
Akasha... The name of one who\nhas nothing.
Is something amiss, Akasha?\nYou've been staring into space\nfor some time.
P-professor! Forgive me, I was lost\nin my research.
Ha ha, yes, I know the feeling well.\nYou're a researcher to your very core.
Um, thank you, sir. What is it we'll be\ndiscussing today?
Ah, yes. Regarding your recent thesis;\nyour approach was quite refreshing.\nI was truly impressed.
As such, I would very much like you to\npresent it at our upcoming academic\nconference.
I would be honored, sir! It would make\nall the long days and nights feel all\nthe more worth it.
Yes, your contributions have been\ngreatly appreciated.
Which is why your name shall be included\nas a co-author.
Why, without my expert advice, the work\nwould not have been possible, yes?
I think it is more than fair to say this thesis\nis born of my OWN knowledge. You simply\nsynthesized and summarized it neatly.
The work will be submitted with two\nauthors—my name first, and yours after.\nAs it should be, yes?
You were heading to the library, right?\nReturn this book for me, would you?
Ha ha, thanks! I knew you'd be a pushover,\nteacher's pet and all. Oh, take these books\ntoo!
Whew, that's a load off.\nC'mon, let's hit the town.
Ooo, I know a great place...
You're LATE. Surely you haven't forgotten\nabout the fête in our manor this evening?
*sigh* You spend too long cooped up\nin that drab academy. Your noble life\nis passing you by!
Many girls would trade their little\nfingers for a seat at the tea parties\nyou so often spurn.
Father, do you remember the thesis\nI wrote? It will be presented at an\nupcoming academic conference.
Yes, yes, very good. Now please,\nchange out of those rags and into\na proper gown. The party awaits!
Nothing that happens around me matters.
But that's fine. I have my place in\nthe world of knowledge. Knowledge will\ntake me far away from here.
So I'm okay. I don't mind being alone...
Might someone be able to assist me?
Absolutely, professor! I'm happy to help\nwith anything you might need.
Mmm. I'd like you to conduct\nsome research on this tome.
What strange binding... Is it some manner\nof magic grimoire?
Just so. It arrived from a nearby village,\nand according to the people there, it is\ncursed.

There were rumors of it being sealed away
long ago, or stolen by some manner of
beast, but we don't deal in rumors here,
do we?
N-no, but... It does seem rather\nominous...
What's that? Did you not say you would\nassist me any way you could?
I-I did indeed, sir. So... Ah! How about\nyou have Akasha handle it?
Hm. Very well. I shall entrust this task\nto you, Akasha.

(I admit I'm a bit hesitant after all that
talk of curses and the like, but... I suppose
it doesn't matter what happens to me
anyway.)
